title: HUGE Avengers Leaks and Batman Teases - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.17.20
description:
Laura Kate Dale joins Tim to discuss Batman teases, Avengers leaks, Flight Simulator reviews, Nintendo Indie announcements, and more.

FOLLOW LAURA:
https://twitter.com/LauraKBuzz

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:48 - Housekeeping
Today, Kinda Funny Games is doing the first ever stream of Samurai Jack: Battle Through Time! Catch it at 1:30pm PT: http://twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
DC FanDome is SATURDAY, and we’re treating it like Greg Miller’s personal E3. Greg and the Kinda Funny crew will be on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames all day long reacting to the panels for Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, WB Montreal’s game, the Snyder cut, and every other DC movie. It all starts at 10 am PT, so don’t miss it!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:45 - WB Games Montreal Teases Batman Arkham Game
From IGN’s Joe Skrebels
00:12:24 - Massive Avengers Leak from Marvel’s Avengers Subreddit user 6plus4equals52
00:19:45 - THPS Remake Character  Leak from THPS Subreddit User derek420
00:21:20 - Ghost of Tsushima Is Getting Free Online Co-Op Later This Year from Zack Zwiezen at Kotaku
00:25:50 - Is this what you wanted out of a potential post release experience from Ghost, if not then what would you have preferred? - Best Friends Q:Ayub from Ottawa
00:31:28 - Sony Working on 'Next Generation' VR Headset, But It Might Not Be PSVR by Joe Skrebels at IGN
00:36:30 - Nintendo Indie World Showcase Tomorrow
00:38:50 - Sports Story Has Been Delayed from Tom Marks at IGN
00:41:48 - Zelda Skyward Sword Listing Found Online by Wario 64
00:44:15 - My question for the Nintendo Duo - With the Zelda Skyward Sword Rumors - what are the chances of ANY other Zeldas game coming to switch - Best Friends Q:Billy The Door
00:47:45 - Microsoft Flight Simulator Reviews Are In
00:51:00 - Out today
00:: -  DoorDash
 Reader mail   -
00:55:15 - On a scale of 1-10, with one being "not very" and ten being "very", how cautious should first adopters be with these new consoles come November-ish?  - The Sheep Whisperer
00:59:15 - Why are we continuing to see developers that in general have been lauded for single player, story based games jumping on the GoS bandwagon? - The Other Shaun
01:04:40 - Squad Up:Julian the Glutan Free Gamer(PSN) - GlutenFreeGamers
01:05:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Imran
